participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

participant_2.background:
My favorite food is campfire stew, because it is warm and filling, and it reminds me of my childhood.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
my favorite hero is superman.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I like to wear clothing that is comfortable and modest, and that reflects my faith.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just making some pottery. I love making pots!
That's awesome! I love art, I'm a photographer.
Really? I love photography! What's your favorite thing to photograph?
I like taking pictures of nature. The beauty of the world never ceases to amaze me.
Me too! I love taking pictures of flowers, especially sunflowers. They're so pretty.
Sunflowers are beautiful! I also like taking pictures of animals. They're so cute and funny.
I love animals too! I have a dog and a cat. They're my best friends.
I love dogs! I have a dog too. He's a big fluffy golden retriever.
That sounds adorable! I love golden retrievers!
They're the best! I love taking him to the park. He loves to run around and play.
That sounds so fun! I wish I could have a dog, but my parents won't let me.
Aww, that's too bad. Dogs are great companions.
I know! I'm hoping to get one when I move out on my own.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll find a great dog.
